links.title: SEDAR Filings
links.content:
[ Skip to content](#content "Skip to content")

[ ![SEDAR+](https://www.sedarplus.ca/landingpage/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/logo-color.png) ](https://www.sedarplus.ca/landingpage/ "SEDAR+")

# WELCOME TO SEDAR+

File, disclose and search for issuer information in Canada’s capital markets

![icon-search](https://www.sedarplus.ca/landingpage/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/icon-search.svg)

[Search SEDAR+](/csa-party/service/create.html?targetAppCode=csa-party&service=searchDocuments&_locale=en)

All public disclosure documents

![icon-reports](https://www.sedarplus.ca/landingpage/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/icon-reports.svg)

[Reporting Issuers List](/csa-party/service/create.html?targetAppCode=csa-party&service=searchReportingIssuers&_locale=en)

Filing organizations from all jurisdictions

![](https://www.sedarplus.ca/landingpage/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/icon-disciplined-list.svg)

[Disciplined List](/csa-order/service/create.html?targetAppCode=csa-order&service=searchDisciplinedList&_locale=en)

People and companies under disciplinary action

![](https://www.sedarplus.ca/landingpage/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/icon-cease-trade.svg)

[Cease Trade Orders](/csa-order/service/create.html?targetAppCode=csa-order&service=searchCeaseTradeOrders&_locale=en)

People and companies restricted from trading securities 

Sign up for email alerts of financial disclosure documents

[ Subscribe to financial document alerts ](/csa-party/service/create.html?targetAppCode=csa-master&service=createFilingSubVerifyCode&_locale=en)

[ Manage email alerts ](/csa-party/service/create.html?targetAppCode=csa-master&service=maintainFilingSubVerifyCode&_locale=en)

Sign up for email alerts of Cease Trade Orders and the Disciplined List

[ Subscribe to regulatory action alerts ](/csa-order/service/create.html?targetAppCode=csa-master&service=createSubscriber&_locale=en)

[ Manage email alerts ](/csa-order/service/create.html?targetAppCode=csa-master&service=maintainSubscriberIntroPage&_locale=en)

Search the archive for public documents filed prior to the launch of SEDAR+

[ Search SEDAR archive ](https://www.sedarplus.ca:5443/legacysedardata/)

## QUICK REFERENCE

### [Access Rules and Policies](https://www.securities-administrators.ca/resources/access-rules-policies/)

View the National and Multilateral instruments currently in force and adopted under each Canadian province’s or territory’s Securities Act or other applicable acts

### [Activity Reports](https://www.securities-administrators.ca/enforcement/activity-reports/)

Access the annual reports of CSA member enforcement activities, intended to provide the public with a better contextual understanding of enforcement activities

### [Filer Quick Reference Guides](/onlinehelp/)

Read the overview information on profiles, filings, payments and refunds, and records of cease trade orders and disciplinary actions in SEDAR+

### [SEDAR+ Rules and Forms](/onlinehelp/general-help/sedar-rule-and-forms/)

View the rules and access forms regarding the electronic transmission of documents and payments through SEDAR+

### [CSA Regulatory Sandbox](https://www.securities-administrators.ca/resources/regulatory-sandbox/)

Information on how the CSA supports Fintech businesses with a faster and flexible process for products, services and applications testing

### [SEDAR+ Fee Guide](https://www.securities-administrators.ca/feeguide/)

The relevant regulatory filing fees governed by the provincial and territorial securities regulatory authorities

[National Registration Search (NRS)](https://info.securities-administrators.ca/nrsmobile/nrssearch.aspx)

[National Registration Database (NRD)](https://www.nrd.ca/)

[System for Electronic Disclosure by Insiders (SEDI)](https://www.sedi.ca/sedi/)

![](https://www.sedarplus.ca/landingpage/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Investment_Tools_Alerts.jpg)

#### Investment Tools and Alerts

Learn how investment frauds happen and how to protect your investments. The CSA has resources to help you understand how to detect potential scams and fraudulent activities.

[ Access CSA resources ](https://www.securities-administrators.ca/investor-tools/)

#### SEDAR+ Events

Visit the events page to view recordings and materials from learning events covering various topics about SEDAR+

[ View Events ](/training/events/)

![](https://www.sedarplus.ca/landingpage/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/Learning_Events.jpg)

Note: Decision Documents may not be available on SEDAR+ for some filings, see [System Status page on the CSA website](https://www.securities-administrators.ca/resources/csa-national-systems-status/) for further details.

[Learn more]()

This is default text for notification bar

[Learn more]()

[ ](javascript:void\(0\)) [ ](javascript:void\(0\))

[ ](javascript:void\(0\))
